name: Sort columns for Comp Off Tab

testSteps.description: 1: Sort columns for Comp Off Tab ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=View Request Status, tab=Comp Off})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Request Status" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
When User clicks on "Comp Off" Tab
Then Sort "Applied for,Days" columns and verify sorting
Then Sort "Reason,Remarks" Columns and verify Sort
